name: Kenneth FORTUNE, Petitioner v. Jeffery BEARD, Respondent

parties: Kenneth FORTUNE, Petitioner v. Jeffery BEARD, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of August, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. The Prothonotary shall direct Petitioner to file the Notice of Appeal within 30 days of the date of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Kenneth FORTUNE, Petitioner v. Jeffery BEARD, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 19, 2008.
